Jean.caption: Dandelion Knight
Jean.name: Jean
Jean.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius of Mondstadt.

Wind_Companion.name: Wind Companion
Wind_Companion.effect: Hits by Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

Let_the_Wind_Lead.name: Let the Wind Lead
Let_the_Wind_Lead.effect: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

Guiding_Breeze.name: Guiding Breeze
Guiding_Breeze.effect: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Jean has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

Favonius_Bladework.name: Favonius Bladework
Favonius_Bladework.effect:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind. Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Gale_Blade.name: Gale Blade
Gale_Blade.effect:
Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.
Hold: At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front.
Direction can be adjusted.
Character is immobile during skill duration.

Dandelion_Breeze.name: Dandelion Breeze
Dandelion_Breeze.effect:
Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and causing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK.
Dandelion Field:
Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo.
Deals Anemo DMG to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field.

1.name: Spiraling Tempest
1.effect: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

2.name: People's Aegis
2.effect: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

3.name: When the West Wind Arises
3.effect: Increases the level of Dandelion Breeze by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Lands of Dandelion
4.effect: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

5.name: Outbursting Gust
5.effect: Increases the level of Gale Blade by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
6.effect: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

Jean.introduction: As the Acting Grand Master of the Knights, Jean has always been devoted to her duties and maintaining peace in Mondstadt. She had taken precautions long before the onset of Stormterror's assault, and she will guard Mondstadt with her life as always.

Sucrose.caption: Harmless Sweetie
Sucrose.name: Sucrose
Sucrose.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

Catalyst_Conversion.name: Catalyst Conversion
Catalyst_Conversion.effect: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

Mollis_Favonius.name: Mollis Favonius
Mollis_Favonius.effect: When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hit an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

Astable_Invention.name: Astable Invention
Astable_Invention.effect: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% chance to obtain double the product.

Wind_Spirit_Creation.name: Wind Spirit Creation
Wind_Spirit_Creation.effect:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack: Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

Astable_Anemohypostasis Creation_6308.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
Astable_Anemohypostasis Creation_6308.effect:
Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals Anemo DMG
Generate 4 elemental particles when it hit at least 1 target.

Forbidden_Creation_Isomer_75_Type_II.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
Forbidden_Creation_Isomer_75_Type_II.effect:
Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull and launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG.
Elemental Absorption: If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

1.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
1.effect: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

2.name: Beth: Unbound Form
2.effect: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

3.name: Flawless Alchemistress
3.effect: Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Alchemania
4.effect: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1~7s.

5.name: Caution: Standard Flask
5.effect: Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Chaotic Entropy
6.effect: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

Sucrose.introduction: An alchemist with an insatiable curiosity towards the world and everything in it. Attached to the Knights of Favonius as an assistant to Albedo, her area of focus is "bio-alchemy." She strives to enrich the world by transforming living things with the power of alchemy. Granted, the products of her research sometimes prove to be more weird than wonderful — but on the whole, she has made monumental contributions to the field of bio-alchemy.

Venti.caption: Windborne Bard
Venti.name: Venti
Venti.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

Embrace_of_Winds.name: Embrace of Winds
Embrace_of_Winds.effect: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

Stormeye.name: Stormeye
Stormeye.effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

Windrider.name: Windrider
Windrider.effect:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

Divine_Marksmanship.name: Divine Marksmanship
Divine_Marksmanship.effect:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG.
Plunging Attack: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Skyward_Sonnet.name: Skyward Sonnet
Skyward_Sonnet.effect:
O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!
Press: Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air.
Hold: Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air.
Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.
Generate 3/4 elemental particles for press/hold when it hit at least 1 target.

Winds_Grand_Ode.name: Wind's Grand Ode
Winds_Grand_Ode.effect:
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in objects and opponents along its path, dealing 18 times Anemo DMG in 8 seconds.
Elemental Absorption: If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal 50% additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

1.name: Splitting Gales
1.effect:
Fires 2 additional split arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.
Note: The additional arrows are fired in a 30° horizontal cone (each 15° to left and right), possibly hitting and damaging the same target in close range. Each arrow has its own critical.

2.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
2.effect: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s. Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

3.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
3.effect: Increases the level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Hurricane of Freedom
4.effect: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

5.name: Concerto dal Cielo
5.effect: Increases the level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Storm of Defiance
6.effect: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

Venti.introduction: A bard that seems to have arrived on some unknown wind - sometimes sings songs as old as the hills, and other times sings poems fresh and new. Likes apples and lively places but is not a fan of cheese or anything sticky. When using his Anemo power to control the wind, it often appears as feathers, as he's fond of that which appears light and breezy.

Xiao.caption: Vigilant Yaksha
Xiao.name: Xiao
Xiao.description: A yaksha adeptus that defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" or "Guardian Yaksha."

Evil_Conqueror_Tamer_of_Demons.name: Evil Conqueror - Tamer of Demons
Evil_Conqueror_Tamer_of_Demons.effect: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists. The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

Dissolution_Eon_Heaven_Fall.name: Dissolution Eon - Heaven Fall
Dissolution_Eon_Heaven_Fall.effect: Using Lemniscatic Wind Cycling increases the DMG of subsequent uses of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 15%. This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

Transcension_Gravity_Defier.name: Transcension - Gravity Defier
Transcension_Gravity_Defier.effect:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

Whirlwind_Thrust.name: Whirlwind Thrust
Whirlwind_Thrust.effect:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground from below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

Lemniscatic_Wind_Cycling.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
Lemniscatic_Wind_Cycling.effect:
Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to opponents in his path.
Can be used in mid-air.
Starts with 2 charges.

Bane_of_All_Evil.name: Bane of All Evil
Bane_of_All_Evil.effect:
Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago.
Yaksha's Mask:

Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability.
Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG.
Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overriden by any other elemental infusion.
In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP.
The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.

1.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
1.effect: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

2.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
2.effect: When in party but not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

3.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
3.effect: Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
4.effect: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

5.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
5.effect: Increases the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
6.effect: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

Xiao.introduction:
One of the "Mighty and Illuminated Adepti" guarding Liyue, also heralded as the "Guardian Yaksha."
Despite his appearance as a young man, occasional legends about him have been documented in ancient books.
He is especially fond of Wangshu Inn's Almond Tofu. The reason is that the dish tastes just like the "dreams" he used to devour.
